id.description: Generate a unique identifier for the step

context_mappings.description: Mappings of context variables for this step, including source_phone, destination_phone, interaction_id, sip_headers. We also can mapping the properties name, company, address, location, exact_match of the object contact and the properties uui for the object sip_headers.

exits.description: Possible exit points or outcomes from this step

_key.description: A UUID identifying the exit, following the UUID format.

transition.description: Id of the step to transition to after this exit

created_at.description: Date and time when the step was created
